San Diego solar energy contractors providing a turn-key product

At Rainbow Solar & Electric, we’re not just another solar company – we’re your trusted partner in sustainable energy solutions. With a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence, we’re dedicated to transforming homes across Southern California into energy-efficient and eco-friendly spaces. Our team of experienced professionals brings expertise in solar panel installation, home battery systems, roofing solutions, and energy efficiency consultation.

Get a Free Estimate
0 +

Years of Experience

With over 35 years of industry experience, we bring unparalleled knowledge and skill to every project we undertake.

0 +

Employees

Our team of over 100 employees is committed to delivering excellence, ensuring your project is handled with care and precision.

0 +

Satisfied Customers

With over 1,200 satisfied customers, you can trust in our ability to deliver outstanding results and exceed your expectations.

Why Choose Us

Energy-independent solutions for your home

Get a Free Estimate

Cost Savings

Our clients notice a drastic reduction in their energy bills when they switch to solar. Many see a return on investments within a year. Systems typically provide 15-20% savings on their utility bill which can add up to $30,000 or more over the course of 20 years. There are significant savings available when your home depends more on your own electrical energy and less on your local utility.

Increased Home Value

Studies show that solar panels add value and help your home sell faster, often in half the time! Homes with an average system size of 3.1 kW sold for approximately $17,000 more than non-solar homes. Homeowners understand the importance of energy costs and are eager to purchase a home with existing lower energy bills. If you have a solar lease, transferring to the new homeowner is simple.

Reduced Carbon Footprint

Traditional electricity is powered by fossil fuel and purchased from companies that burn coal, natural gas, or petroleum. A home that produces enough solar energy to cover all or most of their electrical needs will help offset their carbon footprint and become part of the solution to the problem. An average photovoltaic system greatly reduces carbon footprint and emissions equivalents.

Features and benefits of
working with us

  • Free In-Home Consultation
  • Numerous Financing Options
  • Processing Rebates
  • Federal Tax Credit Liaison
  • Processing Permits
  • HOA Packet
  • Project Tracking
  • Coordinating with your utility
  • Open House
  • Roof Warranty

Our San Diego solar energy contractors can help you choose the best solar energy system to fit your home’s needs. To do this, it is important that we visit and inspect your property to give you an accurate estimate and proposal. California Premier Solar Construction is committed to informing you of your options while always being polite, respectful, patient, and insightful.

We offer true turn-key solutions to bring the power of the sun to your home, including helping you find a financing plan that fits your needs. We offer many options to fit almost any budget!

Our skilled San Diego solar company will help guide you through all the paperwork for any applicable incentives that are currently available. We don’t charge extra for this service and are knowledgeable in finding rebates that apply to your new solar energy system in order to help you save the most money.

In addition to helping you with available incentives, the San Diego solar team at California Premier Solar Construction will help you with any IRS paperwork to help you get a tax rebate on your newly purchased solar energy system.

We make sure all permits are in place before we start your project and include all drawings in your final package. Permits with you jurisdiction are necessary to have a net metering program.

Our San Diego solar company provides details, photos, and drawings to your homeowner’s association to make sure you have the permission to move forward with your project. Even when your HOA has strict standards our technicians always keep to the highest standards from the beginning to the end of your installation.

California Premier Solar Construction’s services don’t end when we have full approval. We’ll provide regular updates and communicate with you throughout your entire project.

Once we’ve performed our last inspection, our San Diego solar energy contractors will contact your local utility company to coordinate your net energy metering. We’ll then make sure you fully understand your new system and all the requirements.

California Premier Solar Construction can schedule an open house to show your new solar energy system off to all your neighbors.

A new energy system is nothing without a good roof to back it up. Our San Diego solar services team stand by our work and provide a 10-year warranty against roof leaks. We never cut corners and our licensed roofers are always involved in your installation to ensure your energy system lasts you for years to come.

Get a Free Estimate

Customer Service

Benefits
& Features

Our family always stays in touch with yours. We want to make sure you experienced a top quality installation and love your new solar energy system. Because we love when past customers refer us for our top-quality services, we always want to make sure you experience the best in the industry.

Free In-home consultation

To do this, it is important that we visit and inspect your property to give you an accurate estimate and proposal.
